[shortdesc]

Post-it Message Flags, InchSign Here Inch, 1 in x 1.7 in (2.5 cm x 4.3 cm), 50 per pack

  • Use Post-it® Message Flags to point out areas to sign, date, initial or notarize
  • The bold, coloured arrows point precisely where you need them, making it easy to locate exactly where someone needs to sign
  • The easy, one-handed dispensing is designed to keep you on track.
